channel.title: New sprite question(new pic) using easyrsc
channel.description:
im gettin an error when i do ::item it spawns the item then logs me out and i get this error
[URL=http://img15.imageshack.us/i/errorry.jpg/][IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/3316/errorry.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
when i log in it logs me out automatically sometimes i can log in then when i hover over inventory it freezes it says i spawned item though line 5018 starts with if (EntityHandler.getItemDef(j15 & 0x7fff).isStackable()) { dunno if that helps
i get this when i hover over inventory
[URL=http://img44.imageshack.us/i/49783915.jpg/][IMG]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/4290/49783915.th.jpg[/img][/URL][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2009, 08:26:40 pm[/size][hr]any ideas?

item.title: New sprite question(new pic) using easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @uberpk3r uberpk3r
item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

when you edit a sprite.

  1. You should look at the sprite size as you need to edit it.
  2. if its to big or just fucked thats what the client does freezes, dc.
    3 never forget to press refresh when you edit a sprite.
  3. use the search bottom there a n00b friiendly guide out here.

Read full topic
item.source: New sprite question(new pic) using easyrsc

item.title: New sprite question(new pic) using easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @aaronsc aaronsc
item.description:
@aaronsc wrote:

If it messes up your inventory go to your server, go into item.xml, copy all the files in there. ctrl+ A then Ctrl +C. Once you’ve copied that, go to your client side and open up items.rscd. make sure you use your compression tool to decompress it first, then hit Ctrl + A and then Ctrl + V. that will copy the items from your server over to your client. Once they match, save the file, re-compress it and put it back into your folder. Once you’ve done that you should be able to hover over the inventory. If you have problems weilding the items afterward, check your animations. Hope it helps.

Read full topic
